title: Event KeyCodes
description: A simple web page that listens for keypresses and displays the key and its ASCII (keyCode). Great for testing or learning about keyboard events.

title: Akatsuki project
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages like React,Node by building an app.

title: Parallax effect webpage
description: Uses CSS for a depth effect with parallax scrolling and ensures smooth layout adjustments across screen sizes with a modern dark theme.
